name: ACS Cares
description: If you or someone you love has been diagnosed with cancer, deciding what’s next can be overwhelming. ACS CARES™ (Community Access to Resources, Education, and Support) is a patient and caregiver support program that connects people with quality curated information and one-on-one support.
